subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jake Peavy, a 26-year-old right-hander for the San Diego Padres, leads the National League with 110 strikeouts and a 1.98 earned run average.
snippet: Jake Peavy, a 26-year-old right-hander for the San Diego Padres, leads the National League with 110 strikeouts and a 1.98 earned run average.
